replies.body:
Hello and welcome to Avicus! I hope you enjoy your time on the server; be sure to check out all the different game modes!

In addition, make sure you read the book in your inventory in the Hub as it is VERY important (It is there for a reason :P) 

Have fun, don't hack, be nice and stay awesome!
